q1_general_response: {"answer": "The lesion is characterized by a cluster of red to purple papules and macules, some of which appear to be coalescing. The lesion also shows some surrounding pallor and scattered telangiectasias. Several hairs are visible in the image, crossing the lesion."}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, I would consider a diagnosis of angioma (cherry angioma or spider angioma)."}
